mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select d.* from (select cpickno, b.cno cno, b.id id, cpickdate, cpickyn, cnm, dongcate, cdodate from clubList a join (select * from clubpick where cpickyn='YES' and id=#{id}) b on a.cno = b.cno)d order by cpickno desc) c) where rnum between #{pageDto.startRow} and #{pageDto.endRow}
select count(*) from clubPick where cpickyn='YES' and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update clubpick set cpickyn='NO', cpickdate=sysdate where cno=#{cno} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select d.* from (select ccurrno, b.cno cno, b.id id, cnm, dongcate, cdodate, ccurrdate from clubList a join (select * from clubCurr where id=#{id}) b on a.cno = b.cno) d order by ccurrdate desc) c) where rnum between 1 and 10

select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select distinct cno, cnm, dongcate, cdodate, cnowstatus from (select d.* from (select clubreviewno, b.cno cno, id, cnm, dongcate, cdodate, giveid, cnowstatus from clubList a join (select * from clubreviewtemp where giveid=#{id}) b on a.cno = b.cno)d order by clubreviewno desc))c) where rnum between #{pageDto.startRow} and #{pageDto.endRow}
select count(*) from clubReviewTemp where giveid=#{id}

select * from (select rownum rnum, c.* from (select cno, id, cnm, cwrdate, cimg, sfno, dongcate, cloc, cdodate, ccontent, ctotalpick, crecruitlimit, cnowrecruit, cnowstatus, scate from clublist where cnowstatus = '모집중' order by ctotalpick desc, cwrdate desc) c) where rnum between 1 and 4
